coded_answer.p: Thank you very much for your goodexcellent programme! We like it very much! But we would like to go to the London Fashion and Leisure Show. It is on Tuesday. We think, that you also wouldwould also like to go there, when you'll knowyou know about it bettermoremore about it. There will be showedshown the latest fashionsThe latest fashions will be shown there. Also, we will see leisure and sports wear.

We know, that you wantedwant to have another and didn'tdon't know which one. If we go to the show, we will see many hairstyles. Maybe it'll help you choose. Also, you'll be glad to know, that for students it is free! So, we think, that it is very good as for you asand for us.

So, we can change your programme a little bit to the best one. On Monday afternoon we have the river trip to Greenwich, as you have written onin your programme. On Tuesday morning we go to the show and after that shopping. And on Wednesday morning we go to the national art galleryNational Art Gallery, butand after that we can go to the Science Museum, in the afternoon.
Our class asks you to think about this programme. We're sure, that you likewill like it very much!

It was dangerous, but I knew I had to do it. My best friend told me, she methad met onea boy. She liked him very much. She was speakingtalking about him everyall the time. She told me, that he was hansomhandsome, kind, and well-understanding (he understood her from a half of the word); the main thing was he also liked her very much!

I belivedbelieved everything she has toldtold me. And said just to bebe careful. But infor three days she hasn't been atdidn't come home. She disappeared! We called the police. They advised us to wait. But we couldn't just sit and wait! We had to do something. InAfter three days of her disappearing the phone has rungrang. I tookpicked up the phone. Someone told me if I wanted to see my friend, I must takeget 5000$ and bringtake themit upout toonto the street. I took anysome paperspaper, put themit tointo onea bag and without saying anything went to my friend to takeget something that looked like a gun. The friend gave me his toy gun and I gonewent toonto the street. There I saw a man and my friend. I showed the man, that I had a gun and money. I was surprised that he belivedbelieved me. Of course, it was better for us. I gave him the bag, took themy friendsfriend's hand and we runran away. After that she told me, that the man was the boy, whichwho she methad met.
Don't believe everyone! Better check, if you are not sure!
